fields.description:
Studio needs to be able to build for adhoc/enterprise and output as an xcode archive and app. Currently it only supports ipa. 

For app output, studio manually copies the app from the build folder into the desired output directory, it would be beneficial if CLI automatically copies the app folder.

For Xcode archive, that's a new behavior needed for the related ticket
fields.summary: CLI: For ad hoc/enterprise builds, need output as ipa, app and xcode archive

comments.body: Closing as a duplicate per [~cbarber] comment.
